title: Archive a Completed Film Production
description: A film production has wrapped, and all its digital assets must be archived for long-term storage.

tasks.description: Identify all digital assets associated with the completed film project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a complete list of all video, audio, and project files.

tasks.description: Run a data integrity check (e.g., checksum) on all files to ensure they are not corrupt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the integrity of all files before archiving.

tasks.description: Transfer all verified assets to the long-term archival storage system (e.g., LTO tape library).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates and completes the transfer to archival storage.
